meanings.sent1: I emailed my friend about the party.
meanings.sent2: She emailed her boss the report.
meanings.sent3: The cat emailed the dog to invite him to a playdate.
meanings.sent4: Her words emailed a sense of urgency to the team.
meanings.sent5: The email she sent was like a bird flying through cyberspace.

meanings.sent1: They emailed back and forth all day.
meanings.sent2: He emailed the client to confirm the meeting.
meanings.sent3: The robot emailed the toaster to discuss breakfast plans.
meanings.sent4: Their thoughts emailed across the distance like magic.
meanings.sent5: The important message was emailed with a click of a button.
